pages.title: AI Image Upscaler
pages.metaTitle: AI Image Upscaler - Enhance Photos to 4K Free | PixelPerfect
pages.metaDescription: Upscale images to 4K resolution with AI. Free online tool that preserves text and logos. No watermarks, fast processing. Try PixelPerfect now.
pages.h1: AI Image Upscaler - Enhance Photos to 4K Resolution Free
pages.intro: Transform low-resolution images into stunning 4K visuals in seconds. Our AI preserves text, logos, and fine details that other upscalers blur.
pages.description: Transform low-resolution images into stunning high-quality visuals with PixelPerfect's AI Image Upscaler. Our advanced neural network technology intelligently enhances your photos while preserving text, logos, and fine details that other upscalers blur or distort.

features.title: Text & Logo Preservation
features.description: Our AI is specifically trained to keep text sharp and readable, perfect for product images, documents, and branded content.

features.title: Lightning Fast Processing
features.description: Get results in 30-60 seconds with our optimized cloud infrastructure. No waiting, no queues.

features.title: Up to 8x Upscaling
features.description: Increase image resolution up to 8x while maintaining exceptional quality and natural-looking details.

features.title: Multiple Format Support
features.description: Upload and download in JPEG, PNG, or WebP format. Convert between formats seamlessly.

features.title: Batch Processing
features.description: Process up to 50 images at once to save time on large projects. Perfect for e-commerce catalogs.

features.title: No Watermarks Ever
features.description: All outputs are clean and watermark-free, even on the free tier. Your images, your way.

useCases.title: E-commerce Product Photos
useCases.description: Enhance product images to meet marketplace requirements and increase conversion rates with crystal-clear visuals.
useCases.example: Amazon requires 1000x1000px minimum - upscale your 500px photos instantly

useCases.title: Real Estate Listings
useCases.description: Make property photos look professional and appealing to potential buyers with enhanced detail and clarity.
useCases.example: Transform smartphone photos into listing-ready professional images

useCases.title: Social Media Content
useCases.description: Create high-resolution images that look crisp on any platform, from Instagram to LinkedIn.
useCases.example: Upscale old photos for throwback posts without the blur

useCases.title: Print Materials
useCases.description: Upscale images to meet print resolution requirements (300 DPI) without quality loss.
useCases.example: Turn a web image into a poster-ready 24x36 inch print

benefits.title: Professional Quality Results
benefits.description: Achieve studio-quality image enhancement without expensive software or technical expertise.

benefits.title: Save Hours of Manual Work
benefits.description: What would take hours in Photoshop takes just seconds with our AI upscaling technology.

benefits.title: Consistent Results Every Time
benefits.description: AI delivers reliable, repeatable quality across all your images with no manual tweaking needed.

howItWorks.title: Upload Your Image
howItWorks.description: Drag and drop your image or click to browse. We support JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 25MB.

howItWorks.title: Select Upscale Level
howItWorks.description: Choose your desired resolution increase: 2x, 4x, or 8x. Higher multipliers create larger images with more detail.

howItWorks.title: AI Enhancement
howItWorks.description: Our neural network analyzes your image and intelligently adds detail while preserving text, logos, and important elements.

howItWorks.title: Download Result
howItWorks.description: Preview your enhanced image and download in your preferred format. No watermarks on any output.

faq.question: Is PixelPerfect's AI image upscaler free?
faq.answer: Yes! PixelPerfect offers 10 free credits to get started. Each image upscale uses 1 credit. For more credits, check our affordable pricing plans starting at $19/month.

faq.question: What image formats does the AI upscaler support?
faq.answer: PixelPerfect supports JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats. You can upload images up to 25MB and download in your preferred format.

faq.question: How long does AI upscaling take?
faq.answer: Most images are processed in 30-60 seconds. Larger images or higher upscale factors may take slightly longer.

faq.question: Will my images be stored on your servers?
faq.answer: We take privacy seriously. Images are automatically deleted from our servers within 1 hour of processing. We never use your images for training or share them with third parties.

howItWorks.description: Multiple AI models work together to fix each issue while maintaining natural-looking results.

howItWorks.title: Compare & Download
howItWorks.description: Use the before/after slider to see the improvement, then download your enhanced photo.

faq.question: Can this AI enhance old or damaged photos?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI is specifically trained on historical photos and can restore faded colors, reduce damage artifacts, and sharpen blurry details in photos that are decades old.

faq.question: How is this different from the AI Image Upscaler?
faq.answer: The Photo Enhancer focuses on improving image quality (colors, sharpness, noise) while keeping the same resolution. The Upscaler increases image size. For best results, enhance first, then upscale.

faq.question: Will my enhanced photos look over-processed?
faq.answer: No. Our AI is trained to produce natural-looking results. We avoid the artificial 'HDR look' that many tools produce. Your photos will look professionally enhanced, not filtered.

faq.question: Does it work on all types of photos?
faq.answer: Yes! Whether it's portraits, landscapes, product photos, or scanned documents, our AI adapts its enhancement approach based on the content detected in your image.
